policies.involuntary_refund:
✅ Involuntary Refunds:
• Allowed if flight shows UN or IRR in GDS.
• Flight is canceled or delayed ≥3 hours.
• Full refund allowed (base fare + fuel surcharge) if ticket unused.
• Infant refund only allowed if segment not flown.
• Must apply within ticket validity or up to 180 days after expiration.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
✅ Involuntary Reissue:
• Free rebooking allowed within 3 days of original flight.
• Must keep same route and class.
• Fare difference applies if outside window or class unavailable.
• Involuntary reissue waived if triggered by:
  • Cancellation
  • Early/late departure
  • Schedule change
  • Aircraft change
  • Delay ≥15 min or broken MCT
• Rebooking allowed through original issuing agent or SZ ticket office.
policies.voluntary_refund:
• Allowed per fare conditions.
• Partial refund not allowed if passenger voluntarily stops at intermediate point.
• Contact original issuing agent for refund requests.
policies.medical_refund:
• Involuntary waiver permitted without fee under IRROPS per Article 3.1.3.
• Health-based waivers allowed with approved medical documentation.
• Voluntary-to-involuntary conversion not permitted if agent acted before Shenzhen published IRROPS.
• For medical or family death waivers, contact support with documentation.
policies.name_change:
✅ Free correction allowed if:
• Error is ≤2 characters (over/under/mis-input)
• Must be done before departure
• Only one correction allowed
• Must keep same route and fare
• New ticket must match original price and flight
🚫 Major name changes (e.g. transfer of ownership) not permitted.
policies.group_booking:
• Group rules not publicly disclosed in full.
• Contact Shenzhen for eligibility.
• Infant fare allowed within group but must meet age and safety criteria.
• No name changes after ticketing; corrections permitted per standard rule.
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants must be ≥14 days old to travel.
• One lap infant per adult (max 2 per adult; second must have separate seat).
• Lap infant must be fastened via infant seatbelt.
• Infants <90 days (preterm or medically unfit) not accepted.
• Infant with seat must use approved restraint device and sit next to adult.
policies.baggage_policy:
• Free baggage allowance varies by fare class and status
• Standard checked bag: 2–32kg (4–70lbs), ≤203cm (linear)
• Excess baggage charged by weight/size; fee varies by route
• Musical instruments, sports equipment, pet carriers must meet special criteria
• Hazardous items (lighters, power banks, gas, corrosives) not allowed
• Claims for lost/damaged bags must be filed:
  • Within 7 days for damage
  • Within 21 days for delay
• No declared value service offered; checked baggage liability capped per law
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Seat assignment optional during booking.
• Final assignment may change due to safety or operational reasons.
• Special seat requests (exit row, PRM, infants) must be declared in advance.
• SZ reserves right to reseat passengers post-boarding for safety compliance.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
• Tickets can be voided within 24 hours of booking if ≥7 days before departure.
• After 24h window, refund rules apply.
• Contact issuing agency or GDS to void or cancel within policy timeframe.
